title: Patch 6.6 Ekko Bug with Q (Timewinder) Audio
body:
Since the 6.6 patch, when using Ekkos Q, timewinder will make audio on collision with enemies/monsters/minions, however when returning to ekko and passing through enemies/monsters/minions, the collision audio does not proc anymore, it just comes back silent.

Just wanted to report another bug on this patch as it is slightly annoying.

Much love, from an Ekko main.

replies.body: Yea sounds very wierd now , kinda tilts me
We're aware of the issue and are looking into it this morning. ^-^ Thanks for the report!
I agree, that's King of disapointing, hope this bug Will be remove :D
Can confirm has been happening to me as well the audio from the return on timewinder when it hits an enemy isnt occuring. Really annoying clarity wise
